channel.title: PypeR on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PypeR on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Working with Python and R
item.description: Think about how # R and Python work together About Basic data plottingandFileinput/outputmethod by R recently explained. Tends to do everything in Python as the language for data analysis Assets by R are attractive and not so easy to truncate. A common case is where you want to use R for partial data analysis but want to write the entire programming in Python. You may also want to do only plotting in R.
